title: Superpartner States in Quantum Mechanics of Colored Particle
abstract: Superpartner correspondence of states of colored particle in external chromomagnetic field given by non-commuting constant vector potentials is determined. Squared Dirac equation for this particle is solved exactly and explicit expressions of superpartner states are found. The wave functions of states with definite energy are found. Supersymmetry algebra and superpartner states in three dimensional motion case are considered.
